## PlayerCameraEventPayloads."PLAYER\_CAMERA.SET\_ZOOM" property

Emitted when the zoom of the camera is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[PlayerCameraEvent.SET_ZOOM]: {
        playerCamera: PlayerCamera;
        zoom: number;
    };
```
